name: BorderFlight the RPG
description:
*NOTE THAT THE FULL GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT*

Download the DEMO to play this amazing RPG

The Storyline

An adventurer, in a new land, trying to save the world from the inevitable doom!!!

Your playing as an adventurer trying to seek new adventures and quest. Complete quests which require you to solve puzzles, battles and much much more. Fight difficult and challenging bosses who you can choose to kill or save, but be careful the wrong choice might just shake your whole adventure upside down!!!!

The Game so far

In the demo you can try and complete 3 different quests one which is a starter quest, one which is required to complete another quest and one quest which will be part of a major quest in the full version of the game...

Feedback:

Make sure to report any bugs or any useful feedback in the comments to help improve the final product!!!
